name: Personal Frontier
description:
You're a space explorer and must survive nine or ten levels of hazards. Known Errors

Background music was linked to a file that is no longer accessible from the specified location (in the code) but the rest of the sound effects all work because they are built into the game engine.

Fixed.

How to Play

Game Engine Used

This one.

No Problem

This game was mirrored from another Itchio account I used to run but which is now officially abandoned. Also, some of the levels closely resemble those in another platformer game I've already uploaded to this account, which was also mirrored from my other now-defunct account.
